text: Janez Kocijančič (October 20, 1941 – June 1, 2020) was a Slovene politician and lawyer. He was also the President of the Slovenian Olympic Committee from 1991 to 2014. From 1993 to 1996, he was Deputy. Kocijančič died on June 1, 2020 in Ljubljana, aged 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Slovenian lawyers Category:Slovenian politicians
title: Janez Kocijančič
